title: 1.12如何用命令方块刷自定义药水
author: 八月灬枫飞
txt_content: 如题，如何在1.12用命令方块刷自定义药水，用/summon 这个指令

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
/summon item ~ ~ ~ {Item:{id:"minecraft:potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"药水名"},Damage:0s}}
来自wiki
药水名字基础II级延长版水瓶water––平凡的药水mundane––浑浊的药水thick––粗制的药水awkward––夜视night_vision–long_night_vision隐身invisibility–long_invisibility跳跃leapingstrong_leapinglong_leaping抗火fire_resistance–long_fire_resistance迅捷swiftnessstrong_swiftnesslong_swiftness缓慢slowness–long_slowness水下呼吸water_breathing–long_water_breathing治疗healingstrong_healing–伤害harmingstrong_harming–中毒poisonstrong_poisonlong_poison再生regenerationstrong_regenerationlong_regeneration力量strengthstrong_strengthlong_strength虚弱weakness–long_weakness幸运luck––例如召唤一个抗火药水
/summon item ~ ~ ~ {Item:{id:"minecraft:potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"minecraft:fire_resistance"},Damage:0s}}

如果自定义效果就是：/give @p potion 1 0 {CustomPotionEffects: [{Id:药水ID,Amplifier:等级,Duration:时间}],display: {Name: "物品名字"}}
物品名字可以不填，那样会默认名为不可合成的药水
